column5: My place is across from Texas A&M campus. Gorgeous sunset view of Kyle Field and Aggie Land golf course from the front window/porch. Spacious 4 bedrooms, 2 with private and 1 share bathrooms. Large covered back porch with huge fenced backyard. Youâ€™ll love my place because it is a one story cottage that is very well maintained and has three large family gathering areas - the kitchen, living room and back patio. The bathrooms have extra large showers and recently updated.
